Method that gets the values of a certain portfolio :param portfolio: portfolios given by the model :type portfolio: DataFrame :param down_base_ebitda: values of ebitda in down :type down_base_ebitda: np.Array :param down_base_emissions: values of low_emissions in down :type down_base_emissions: np.Array :param down_base_global: values of global_nation in down :type down_base_global: np.Array
